InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S4 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 4

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Mantis GT-220 Gatling
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Gatling
Size: 3

The Mantis GT-220 is a hydraulically-driven Gatling-type rotary cannon designed to deliver smaller rounds at a very high rate of fire. The Mantis is designed to shred armor on very fast targets, sacrificing power for absolute saturation of the target area.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S4 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems

Size: 4

InstalledItem.Name: C4-160f S5 Hornet Ball Turret
InstalledItem.Description: C4-160f S5 Hornet Ball Turret

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-337 Panther Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 3

The CF-337 Panther is the size three model in Klaus & Werner's laser repeater line. The Panther is a true fire-and-forget weapon with a respectable power consumption-to-damage ratio. Pilots who outfit their ships with Panthers rarely regret the decision.

InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Hornet F7C Nose Turret
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Turret
Manufacturer: Anvil Aerospace
Size: 3

This nose turret was designed specifically for Anvil's F7C Hornet to allow for mounting two Size-1 weapons and precise gimbaled tracking of targets.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-341 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 4xS1

Behring’s MSD-341 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S1 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.

InstalledItem.Name: AllStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Gorgon Defender Industries first created the AllStop shield generator to hold off the Vanduul. They worked so well that many military crafts were known to prefer the AllStop. Just one of the many reasons to have one on your ship.

InstalledItem.Name: AllStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Gorgon Defender Industries first created the AllStop shield generator to hold off the Vanduul. They worked so well that many military crafts were known to prefer the AllStop. Just one of the many reasons to have one on your ship.

InstalledItem.Name: Regulus
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

The Regulus is the power plant you can count on when everyone is counting on you. Made to exceed exacting military standards, Aegis’ design team has made sure that you have the extra power you need, when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: Bracer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

For those looking for a solid, dependable mid-line cooler, you can’t do much better than Aegis’ Bracer. This small-frame cooler system offers solid performance and durability to keep your ship firing on all cylinders.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.
